name: fluxo.io
description: Full-stack application with frontend, backend, and AWS deployment

scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:frontend && npm run install:backend
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend
scripts.format: npm run format:frontend && npm run format:backend
scripts.type-check: npm run type-check:frontend && npm run type-check:backend
scripts.deploy:aws: npm run deploy:frontend:aws && npm run deploy:backend:aws
scripts.deploy:aws:staging: aws s3 sync frontend/dist/ s3://fluxo-staging-frontend --delete && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name fluxo-staging-backend --zip-file fileb://backend/dist.zip
scripts.deploy:aws:production: aws s3 sync frontend/dist/ s3://fluxo-production-frontend --delete && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name fluxo-production-backend --zip-file fileb://backend/dist.zip
